text: Provincial elections were held in Vojvodina on 21 June 2020.Нови датум одржавања редовних покрајинских избора 21. јун RTS, 10 May 2020 Initially organised for 26 April 2020,Пастор расписао покрајинске изборе за 26. април RTS, 3 March 2020 they were postponed by a state of emergency due to the COVID-19 pandemic in Serbia.Serbia postpones April 26 elections due to coronavirus outbreak – state election commission Reuters, 16 March 2020 ==Electoral system== The 120 members of the Assembly are elected by closed- list proportional representation from a single provincial constituency. Seats are allocated using the d'Hondt method with an electoral threshold of 3% of all votes cast (lowered from 5% at the previous elections)Electoral threshold reduced to 3% Serbian Monitor, 13 January 2020 although the threshold is waived for ethnic minority parties.Electoral system IPU ==Electoral lists== 1\. Aleksandar Vučić — For Our Children 2\. Ivica Dačić – "Socialist Party of Serbia (SPS), United Serbia (JS) – Dragan Marković Palma" 3\. Dr Vojislav Šešelj — Serbian Radical Party 4\. Vajdasági Magyar Szövetség — Pásztor István / Alliance of Vojvodina Hungarians — István Pásztor 5\. Vojvodina Front — (League of Social Democrats of Vojvodina, Together for Vojvodina, Vojvodina's Party, Democratic Alliance of Croats in Vojvodina, Montenegrin Party, Democratic Bloc) 6\. For Kingdom of Serbia — For Serbian Vojvodina 7\. BROOM 2020 8\. Čedomir Jovanović — Coalition for Peace 9\. Academician Muamer Zukorlić — Straight Ahead — Justice and Reconciliation Party (SPP) — Democratic Party of Macedonians (DPM) ==Results== Just like on the national level, many opposition parties boycotted the elections, leading to the ruling SNS-led For Our Children alliance winning over 60% of both votes and seats. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:right" ! colspan="2" |Party list !Votes !% !Seats !+/– |- | bgcolor="" | | align="left" |For Our Children (SNS–SDPS–PS–PUPS–PSS–SNP–SPO) |498,495 |61.58 |76 | +13 |- | bgcolor="" | | align="left" |Socialist Party of Serbia–United Serbia |90,512 |11.18 |13 | +1 |- | bgcolor="" | | align="left" |Alliance of Vojvodina Hungarians |75,218 |9.29 |11 | +5 |- | bgcolor="#03C03C" | | align="left" |Vojvodina Front (LSV–ZZV–VP–DSHV–CP–DB) |41,455 |5.12 |6 | –3 |- | bgcolor="" | | align="left" |Broom 2020 |35,479 |4.38 |5 | +5 |- | bgcolor="#4169E1" | | align="left" |For the Kingdom of Serbia |34,083 |4.21 |5 |New |- | bgcolor="" | | align="left" |Serbian Radical Party |26,489 |3.27 |4 | –6 |- | bgcolor="#8FBC8F" | | align="left" |Straight Ahead (SSP–DPM) |3,070 |0.38 |0 |New |- | bgcolor="" | | align="left" |Coalition for Peace |4,658 |0.58 |0 |±0 |- | colspan="2" align="left" |Invalid/blank votes |42,562 |– |– |– |- | colspan="2" align="left" |Total |852,972 |100 |120 |0 |- | colspan="2" align="left" |Registered voters/turnout |1,696,292 |50.28 |– |– |- | colspan="6" align="left" |Source: Provincial Elections Committee of Vojvodina (100% counted) |} ==References== Category:Elections in Vojvodina Vojvodina Category:21st century in Vojvodina Vojvodina Vojvodina
title: 2020 Vojvodina provincial election
